history.proof: intros a. hauto lq: on depth: 3use: mon_ind, is_nil_id.

exceptions.exn: Abstracting over the terms "n" and "a" leads to a term fun (n0 : nat) (a0 : mon n0) => a0 = n_0 which is ill-typed. Reason is: Illegal application: The term "@eq" of type "forall A : Type, A -> A -> Prop" cannot be applied to the terms "mon n0" : "Set" "a0" : "mon n0" "n_0" : "mon 0" The 3rd term has type "mon 0" which should be coercible to "mon n0".

original: intros a. induction a using mon_ind. - reflexivity. - specialize (IHn a c). rewrite is_nil_id. apply IHn.
